top_comments.comment: **Me seeing that the lava bomb didn't explode**: My Disappoinment is immeasurable and my day is ruined

comments_since_last_sample.body: I wish they would fire these annoying narrators
Clickbait on News? Is not new one
It has not destroyed thousands of homes. It hasn't destroyed hundreds of homes. It hasn't destroyed dozens of homes. Why would you report that? Even in the footage you've shown, no destruction.
I was waiting for a youtuber to chuck a salted and peppered wagu steak on it and hit it with some rosemary garlic and butter
I am from here! Awesome place!
It’s probably a beautiful big diamond 💎 inside of it 🤭
